critique: The document is an executive order focused on increasing the minimum wage for federal contractors. It aims to promote economy and efficiency in procurement by ensuring contractors adequately compensate their workers. The order establishes a minimum wage of $10.10 per hour beginning January 1, 2015, and provides for annual increases based on the Consumer Price Index. It also addresses tipped workers and outlines regulations and implementation procedures. The order emphasizes enforcement and includes general provisions regarding its interpretation and application.
